New_Bedford.Ezekiel Sawin House:
The Ezekiel Sawin House is a historic house located at 44 William Street in Fairhaven, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The two-story, wood-framed house was built between 1840 and 1844 by Ezekiel Sawin, president of the Fairhaven Bank. It is an elaborate and distinctive expression of Greek Revival styling, with a wraparound porch supported by Ionic columns, and wide corner pilasters.
